translations.translation: by the violently gusting blasts,
And those that strike violently,
which then blow tempestuously
by (the angels) as swift as blowing winds,
Then by oath of those that push with a strong gust.
The `Asifat `Asfa.
By the raging hurricanes,
storming tempestuously
By the raging hurricanes,
and then storming on with a tempest's force,
And those raging swiftly;
by those who sweep along like gale,
Which then blow violently in tempestuous Gusts,
And by the winds that blow violently,
storming tempestuously
Storming turbulently.
And the winds that blow violently
[77:2] by the raging hurricanes, the violent winds;

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا (2) وقال الجمهور : العاصفات : الرياح ولم يحك الطبري فيه مخالفاً . وقال القرطبي : قيل العاصفات : الملائكة .

translations.translation: (By the raging hurricanes) and He swore by the violent hurricanes which blow away people's houses,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
{ فَٱلْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفاً } معناه الرِّيحُ { وٱلنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْراً } معناه الرّيحُ
 ويقال: المُمطرُ
 ويقال: البَعثُ يوم القِيامةِ

translations.translation:
{The winds are blowing} - this means the wind is blowing
{The clouds are gathering} - this means the clouds are gathering
 It is said: The rain

المُمطرُ هو الماء الذي يُنازل من السماء في الشتاء والصيف.

The rain is the water that falls from the sky in winter and summer.


It is said that the resurrection will take place on the Day of Judgment.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَٱلْعَاصِفَاتِ } النازعات ملابس الناسوت
 وثياب الإمكان عن أرواح المحبين المنجذبين نحو الحق { عَصْفاً } [المرسلات: 2] سريعاً شديداً تخليصاً لهم عن سجن الطبيعة تفريجاً وترويجاً

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { فالعاصفاتِ عَصْفاً } أي: تعصفن في مُضِيهنّ عصف الرياح
